description: Amendments to planning permission dated 22 July 2019 (RN: 19/03873) for alterations at roof level including the installation of plant rooms and the creation of a pavilion rooftop extension and terrace area, along with other alterations including creation of an auditorium at the lower ground floor level together with the in-fill of the atrium space to provide access to the upper floors of the building.  Associated alterations to Little St James's Street entrance, NAMELY, removal of additional dry-lining, removal of walls within the new-build extension, removal of modern smoke vents and doors in the listed building, reinstatement of windows in the listed building at the lower ground floor level, reconfiguration of approved auditorium space as well as localised areas within the building, replacement of the existing cladding to the modern office entrance with stone to match existing, realignment of the modern office entrance revolving doors, in-fill of the arches in the listed building, installation of full-height fire-proof glass to replace the existing glazed balustrade in the atrium at first and third floor levels, installation of automatic opening vent (AOV) in the stairwell at fifth and fixth floor levels, creation of new openings within the listed building fabric and the new-build extension creation of new sumps to accommodate the reconfiguration of the changing rooms (LINKED TO 20/01152/LBC).
